resources.string: Stay up to date about COVID-19

This application is aimed at providing people the necessary basic knowledge about COVID-19. The application provides a functionality where people can ask common questions about COVID-19 and get related answers from an chatbot deployed on the web. People can also get information of the current status of COVID-19 for many countries in the world. This application was developed as an Internship project by: 

 Jember Liku Amare
 UESTC, China
 December, 2021.
UESTC Shahe Campus:No.4, Section 2, North Jianshe Road Chengdu, China
